msbt.message: Thanks for the prezzie! Things can get way busy this time of the year, so it made me SUPER happy that you thought of me! I've been shopping all the year-end sales, so I got you something too!
I've been happy all morning because of the prezzie you sent! The year's almost over, so I got you a little something to start the next one off right!
I know you're totally super busy since it's the end of the year, so THANK YOU for the note and the gift! Ohmigosh. I got you something too. Enjoy enjoy!
Wow. The year's almost over, huh? I've always said, "Time flies when you're doing cool stuff," and that's totes true, isn't it, ?
This year sure ended FAST! It was only 300-and-something days long. How am I supposed to get anything done in that short of a time?! We'll have to try and do more next year!
IT'S ALMOST OVER! GAAAAAH! When I think about how it's the end of the year, I kind of feel sort of sad. But then I remember we can hang out all next year, and I feel better! Have a happy new year!
